attributes.action: Reduce university tuition fees for academic years 19/20 and 20/21
attributes.background: Due to the current climate students are not receiving the service that they are paying for.  Therefore they should not pay the full tuition fees.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
